name: [deleted]
text:
Kyle has been exiled from the GLC. He's bumming around with the New Guardians. Guy and John are Honor Guard Lanters based on Oa ( before the Guardians went completely insane). Sinestro was assigned to the Earth sector. Hal had his ring stripped.
Since Hal and Sinestro are missing and assumed gone, this Baz has been chosen as GL.
